name: McKesson Medical Imaging
overview: McKesson provides hospitals with Horizon Medical Imagingâ„¢ picture archiving and communication system (PACS), Horizon Radiologyâ„¢ RIS/PACS solution and Horizon Cardiologyâ„¢ cardiovascular image and information management solution (CVIS) to improve decision-making, automate clinical workflow, streamline patient care and minimize errors. Horizon Medical Imaging (PACS) and Horizon Radiology Manager (RIS) enable hospitals and clinics to acquire, distribute and archive medical images and diagnostic reports across the enterprise. These solutions integrate images from multiple modalities with clinical patient data, streamlining radiology department workflow and improving radiologist efficiency. The RIS/PACS solution also provides referring physicians with patient images as part of a complete electronic medical record, improving decision-making and helping to ensure patient safety. Horizon Cardiology is a complete CVIS solution for cath lab, hemodynamic monitoring, echocardiography, vascular ultrasound and nuclear cardiology. It addresses the full spectrum of needs for healthcare organizations with diagnostic digital image management, archiving, procedure reporting and workflow management.
